MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. This is causing power issues to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:19am. Our engineers have arrived on siteand our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:46am on 26th December
